about_the_game:
The Team Ice Cream VR demo plops you down on an island to make ice cream to hordes of customers. Either go it alone as a solo ice cream maestro taking on the world of ice cream in VR or get assistance from a friend playing on the PC.

When playing co-op, only the assistant playing on PC can see the customers' orders, so better sharpen your communication skills! Prepare for tons of hectic fun!



Get Money - Make sure the ice cream you deliver to the customer is quick and tasty and your tip jar will fill up nicely. Fail to deliver a cone up to the customer's standards, however, and your reputation may take a hit.




Get Help - Play as The Assistant on PC to help the Maestro out. You get to perform noble tasks such as attracting customers, taking orders and keeping seagulls away from tables!

Demo Features

  • Day & Night Cycle - Work from dawn 'til dusk
  • Ice Cream Physics - Drop your ice cream and watch it slop on the ground
  • Local Co-Op - Have a friend on the PC help you out, everything is more fun together
  • Tip System - Earn money from tips

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (72 Hz @ Lowest)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 (72 Hz @ Lowest)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K or AMD 1700x (120 Hz @ Ultra)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 1070 (90 Hz @ High) or RTX 2080 Super (120 Hz @ Ultra)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Play alone in VR—or get together with a friend on PC and work as a team—to attract and serve customers ice cream. Scoop ice cream, sprinkle sprinkles and plop on a wafer roll to make beautiful cones, earn tips based on quality.
